sentences.en: Air France first-class seats recline almost like beds.
sentences.cn: 法国航空公司头等舱的坐椅可以调低成几乎像床一样。

sentences.en: And they did so and made them all recline.
sentences.cn: 15门徒就如此行,叫众人都坐下.

sentences.en: Bed: Piece of furniture on which a person may recline or sleep.
sentences.cn: 床: 供人在上面躺卧的家具.
可以把座位放平 吗 ?

sentences.en: For added passenger comfort, rear seats recline 12 degrees.
sentences.cn: 为增加乘客的舒适, 后排座椅放倒12度.

sentences.en: Lk. 9:15 And they did so and made them all recline.
sentences.cn: 路 九 15门徒就如此行,叫众人都坐下.
我是否可将座位向后倾倒?

sentences.en: Position the seatback in the full forward or full recline position.
sentences.cn: 在尽量向前或倾斜的位置安置座椅.

sentences.en: Recline & Sprawl is an amusingly named furniture shop in London.
sentences.cn: Recline&Sprawl是伦敦一家店名有趣的家具店。

sentences.en: She proceeded to recline on a chaise longue.
sentences.cn: 她开始斜靠在一个躺椅上。

sentences.en: Some guests recline in lounge chairs on the sea-facing terrace.
sentences.cn: 在面向大海的平台上一些客人斜躺在躺椅上。

sentences.en: The front seatbacks recline fully flat for relaxing.
sentences.cn: 前排座椅靠背可以完全放平,使您得到松弛.

sentences.en: There is no need to recline and rest in mock desperation.
sentences.cn: 更不要以绝望无助的姿态坐视不理.

sentences.en: To move, stand, or recline in an indolent or relaxed manner.
sentences.cn: 懒洋洋地闲荡懒洋洋地或放松地移动 、 站立或斜倚.

sentences.en: We shouldn't recline too much upon book learning.
sentences.cn: 我们不应过多地依赖书本知识.

sentences.en: Woniu fire while taking Chunniu - recline , with the charm.
sentences.cn: 卧牛火则取春牛横卧状, 各具神韵.

words.tran_cn: 斜靠著的人；躺著的人；活动躺椅（等于reclining chair）

trans.tran_en: to lie or lean back in a relaxed way

trans.tran_cn: 使躺下，使斜倚，靠，依靠，信赖

trans.tran_en: to lie or lean back in a relaxed way
